titleStmt.title: A philosophicall essay towards an eviction of the being and attributes of God. Immortality of the souls of men. Truth and authority of Scripture. together with an index of the heads of every particular part.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Seth, 1617-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, and are to be sold by John Adams and Edward Forrest,

notesStmt.note: In part a reply to: Hobbes, Thomas. Leviathan.
The words "being .. Scripture." are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
